SummaryEnglish: Twilight Q (トワイライトQ Towairaito Kyū?) is an anime OVA series released in Japan in 1987 by Network Frontier (now Bandai Visual). The series is similar to The Twilight Zone in content and presentation.

1.SummaryEnglish: Two girls are at a beach where one of them finds an old camera. She develops the film and finds out that she's in some of the pictures, despite not remembering the pictures being taken. She then finds out the camera is a model not yet released.

2.SummaryEnglish: A detective investigating the mysterious disappearances of airplanes, and his investigation into a father and daughter.
